text:
a pleasant stay in Berawa/Canggu with Citadines Berawa Beach Bali...
Lokasi nya dekat Cafe restaurant.. tempat yg tepat untuk menikmati sunset.. udara sejuk.. GM dan All Staff Ramah..
I ❤️ Citadines Berawa Excellent 4*
title: Wonderful Hotel

owner_response.text:
Hi ajengu2021,

Thank you so very much for your wonderful review

Betul sekali untuk lokasi yang bisa dibilang sempurna karena hotel Citadines Berawa Beach Bali dikelilingi oleh restaurants yang sangat trendi dan terkenal dengan variasi makanannya. Sangat senang mendengar kepuasan anda tinggal dengan kami dan dengan senang hati akan menyampaikan pujiannya ke rekan rekan kerja 

Semoga sampai dengan nyaman kembali ke rumah dan ditunggu kedatangan berikutnya

Salam,
Francisca Thorogood
General Manager
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text: Salah satu Hotel terbaik di Bali dengan View Pantai Berawa. Menginap disini seperti tidur dikamar sendiri,nyaman dan tenang. Keramahan para karyawannya membuat saya betah. Menikmati sunset tidak perlu keluar hotel cukup pergi ke rooftop sambil berenang kita bisa menikmati sunset . Recommended!
title: Terbaik !

owner_response.text:
Yang Terhormat irwan_adi19,

Terima kasih banyak sudah menginap di hotel kami.

Senang mendengar pujian dan kepuasan Anda selama menginap di Hotel kami terutama kenyaman dan keramahan dari tim kami. Menikmati matahari terbenam menjadi saat yang bagus dari rooftop kami dan bisa menjadi spot instagram yang cantik.

Rekomendasi Anda kepada anggota TripAdvisor sangatlah kami hargai. Terimakasih dan semoga kami bisa menyambut kembali diliburan berikutnya

Salam,
Francisca Thorogood
General Manager

text: Stay dihotel ini nyaman banget & tenang , karyawannya ramah2 , kamar bersih & kolam renangnya ada 2 tinggal pilih mau berenang dibawah atau diatas ... & pasti akan kembali lagi utk stay di hotel ini...

Salam,

text: Luar biasa! Ini hotel di kawasan Villa dengan fasilitas kamar ala apartemen. Cocok utk keluarga kami yg memiliki anak kecil. Ada kompor listrik dan microwave. Jg ada laundry area. Top banget..5 star!!

text: The location is just too awesome. Super convenient with many cafes and restaurants. Spoiled for choices. Grab food was awesome and convenient. Staff was super friendly and helpful. The hotel spa left a great impression. Everything in this hotel was good. Will definitely come back here again!

text: It’s a great mix of services appartment and hotel facilities making it perfect for longer stays . The staff was courteous and always available for anything you needed . The location is minutes from the beach and the area has amazing night life if you want to hand out after work. The vicinity has great eating options . Loved the way the overall props is designed with dog park at the rooftop and pool facing the beach and sunset . The pool facing the beach and sunset were the most beautiful part of the property and had fun watching sunset while sipping cocktails . Would recommend for friends , couples , solo travelers…
title: Long stay , dog friendly , perfect location.

owner_response.text:
Dear Tanvi S,

Really appreciate to your positive review, we will share it to all the staff so they can do even better service in the future.

Indeed, the property is located in the middle of the happening area of Canggu, just a short walking distance to the beach, surrounded by many spots like cafe and spas.


We hope to serve you again in your next holiday in Bali.


sincerely yours,
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text:
Good value accommodation that is well kept. 
The bedroom we stayed in was  comfortable but small. The bathroom was very cramped, you had to squeeze up against the basin to be able to open and shut the door. 
We had someone ring our doorbell at 9pm and proceeded to open our door. We thankfully had the door latched so they could not open it far. When I called reception they thought it might have been a staff member coming to clean the room but were unsure. 
It is about a half an hour walk to a happening part of canngu where there are shops and restaurants. However it is a fantastic spot if you want to be close to Finns Beach club and a quiet spot on the beach.
title: Good value - basic accommodation

owner_response.text:
Dear mirandamaginness,

Thank you very much for sincere feedback.
We are sorry for your unpleasant experience that someone has knocked your door. I will make sure that all staffs will be retrained again.
Indeed, the property is located in the happening area of Canggu, where you can easily explore many spots.

We hope to see you again later in the future to deliver better service.

Sincerely Yours,
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text:
Bali airport is chaos. queue to show covid pass, queue to buy a visa £27pp, queue for passport control,  queue to fill in a form showing names and number in party! Private transfer took one and a half hours due to traffic. When you arrive the reception team are full of smiles. We had two rooms booked
 A studio and an executive studio (which cost more). They are absolutely identical,  100% the same. DO NOT pay extra. When we mentioned this to reception. we were moved to the top floor, again an identical room! The rooms are spotlessly clean,  fridge, safe, tea/coffee etc, hairdryer.  A decent shower and toiletries.. Breakfast 7am -11am, a good selection of food. Not the best organised but the willingness of the staff makes up for it. The hotel is surrounded by filth. Everywhere is dirty. We walked to the nearby beach. Greeted by piles of stinking rotting rubbish.  A beach full of nappies, needles,  bottles etc. No excuse,  we visited 5 years ago,  it was the same!  The hotel is in a very noisy area. Construction everywhere,  traffic, dogs howling night and day, doors slamming.  Bring your ear plugs. you will need them! Lots of cafes/ restaurant's within walking distance,  all nestled among the rubbish. All in all a lovely hotel, shame about the rest!!
title: A Palace surrounded by filth!

owner_response.text:
dear TWEEDY5,

Thank you for your time to have written us the review.
Really appreciate your feedback regarding our property and the surrounding area.
We will take your feedback and highlight them to be improved.

Hope to see you again in your future visit in Bali.

Regards,
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text:
Such an amazing hotel. Nothing is too much trouble for all staff. They pay attention to detail and are all so warm and welcoming. From check in to check out the service from everyone including the security team was incredible, we felt like part of the family. Especially the manager Mr Dwi, he and team went out of he's way to make sure our stay was a memorable one and such great personality and he always made feel welcomed and comfortable.
Clean rooms, the pools are always clean and so very welcoming and breakfast is a great way to start the day. The hotel is within walking distance to the beach and to bars/restaurants. Thing to improve is the speed of internet, hard to work remotely as the connection was up/down. Overall, the best place hands down in canggu, in fact the best place I have stayed in Bali by far. This was my fourth visit to bali and this hotel is amazing.
title: Outstanding hotel and staff

owner_response.text:
Dear X1011TXkimh,

It is always a pleasure to hear about our guests having an enjoyable holiday at our resort with our services, activities and facilities. This will allow other travelers to know this positive feedback too.

Thank you for mentioning Dwi, our Guest Experience Manager showing an outstanding service to you during your stay. We are sure that he will be very happy to know that his service has been well recognized. 

We noticed too on the shortfall from the internet connection and rest assure this has been informed to respective manager for immediate improvement.   
 
We sincerely look forward to welcoming you again in the near future.
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text:

Wrt the room, Maybe an upgrade to sound-proof contractual will be perfect.

text: Hotel is conveniently located near the beach, restaurants and nightlife. Hotel staff were exceptional in service and found solutions for our various requests. Great views from rooftop bar. Hotel amenities are relatively standard but in good condition. Self service Launderette is a great idea!
title: Great stay for a family trip (including baby)

owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text:
Stayed in 1 bedroom premier for 3 nights
Hotel/apartment is well maintained and hotel website pictures are almost what you will get. Staff are still helpful yet busy.
The wood feeling in the room is minimalistic and very good design. It has a muji (Japan brand) vibe.
The rooftop bar view is good. The ambience and crowd is just right, not too little not too much.
Coffee at the lemon salt cafe is simple and good. Service is good.
Location is good to travel out (before 2pm) to cafes and come back after 8pm (avoid heavy traffic)
Before the stay, I was worried about the noise, but it turned out fine. The noise levels at night is very mild (imagine a soft bass) as this is canggu area with many Popular beach clubs. I will tend to believe that the Low star reviews might be due to the sensitivity to noise. Light sleepers and sensitive noise people are NOT recommended to stay here/canggu beach area. 
Do take note that activities are moving towards canggu that is a lovely and lively area.

For the price (depending on the room), I highly recommend this place as it is definitely worth.
title: Value place and highly recommend

owner_response.text:
Dear HYLim87,
It is so nice to have such a review from you and we are sure that you have an enjoyable stay at Citadines Berawa Beach Bali.
The new hotel plan and concept are indeed designed to meet our current customer expectation on choosing the accommodation type with a new style.
Location wise in the heart of Berawa Beach within Canggu and Seminyak area made this destination accessible to most happening area in Bali.

Hope to welcoming you again in the nearest future.

text:
Inadequate services, not a four stars hotel. We booked almost a month in advance for King size bed Studio Executive. We got a twin bed put together as one that makes the middle part hard. I hit my head on it.
When checking out, we called a bellboy to help with our pieces of luggage. Before reaching our rooms, other guests asked the bellboy to get their luggage items. Instead of calling another bellboy for the other guests, he walked away with other guests’ pieces of luggage. We must wait longer for this stupidity.

Swimming pools are small and overrated.
title: Not a 4 stars service class

owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text: This is a very new hotel so everything is very modern and clean. There are two pools (ground and rooftop) with restaurant, gym and office available. The breakfast at the restaurant is nice however it does take a while to get to you - even raw food such as the smoothie bowl.  As per everywhere in Bali the staff are very nice and hard working. The locality is also central to the beach and beach clubs of Canggu. With that comes the noise issue. You will hear music (and other customers complaining loudly about noise) and fireworks up to about midnight. Other than that I thoroughly enjoyed my time at this hotel and would stay again.
title: Beautiful but can be noisy

owner_response.text:
Hi RowanI,
We are glad to know that you have such a beautiful stay recently. Thanks for all the compliment about products, services and facilities, this will allow other guest to see it too. However we have taken note on the breakfast part for better improvement, for sure the respective manager has been informed about this. Canggu Berawa is a happening area now and many attractions takes place as well as new supply to please their customer with variety of life style choices.

Please let us know once your travel plans bring you back to Bali!
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text:
Enjoyable stay. We had a two bedroom apartment. The design of the apartment is such that both rooms and the living area open completely to the balcony via full length glass doors. So it could be bright and airy, or complete privacy when the curtains were drawn. We really enjoyed this. 

King bed in master, twins in second bedroom. Both en suite. Beds were comfortable. Living area had a day bed/sofa. Dining table and 4 chairs. Kitchenette was better equipped than we expected (cutleries, plates, cups, microwave, standard size fridge, stove top, standing drinking water dispenser etc) but we didn’t use them.

Staff (other than the slight confusion at check in) were great, filled all my requests quickly. Good work there.

Two swimming pools on the property, one on ground floor, one roof top. The roof top one looked out to the beach, beside a bar with live music at certain times.

5 minutes walk to the beach, less than 10 to a supermarket and plenty of cafes and restaurants.
title: Clean and functional apartment, great stay

owner_response.text:

Hope to seeing you again in the nearest future. 

Best regards,
Heri Chandra 
Director of Sales

text: The top floor restaurant is definitely the best thing in hotel and the infinity pool is gorgeous and well maintained . The french chef created a great menu and the food is some of the best i had in an hotel. Try the steak plate or the half  chicken with mashed potatoes ! For breakfast the croque monsieur with the sauce i still think of it !! The room was large , other pool was great ! The decor was amazing as well !

text: The Citadines Berawa has been a home away from home here in Bali. The rooms are beautiful, clean and a cool refuge from the everyday heat of Bali. The hotel has a great little gym, two pools and several other amenities that we really enjoyed. My favourite experience has been watching the sunset from the Skylounge , the view is unbelievable and the atmosphere is magic. The manager of the hotel is absolutely lovely, helpful and welcoming. Citadines is in the heart of Canggu close to everything but still on a quiet peaceful street, a VERY close walk from the beach. You are in the heart of the action but still enjoy peace and quiet.
title: An inspiring, beautiful stay

text:
I can say it is a hotel with a good deal they offer.
Considering it is really so close to Berawa beach, great amenities inside the room, complete facilities, friendly & helpful staffs, clean, what can I complain? 😂
Oh they have rooftop lounge with pool for you to chill while waiting the sunset.

I would love to have next stays when I come to Canggu again!

Dear 528pipitc,

Thank you for sharing your feedback to TripAdvisor community

Thank you again and we cant wait to welcoming you back soon

owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text:
I stayed in Citadines Berawa for 2 months (July and August 2021). It was the time when Covid case was at their peak in Indonesia and hospitality industry in Bali was affected badly. Some hotels in Bali understandably reduce their staffs and services, but not Citadines. Service was excellent and the staffs are friendly. 

Location is excellent. Walking distance to the beach and many cafes. Pepito supermarket is near the hotel.

Room is convenient. Mini kitchen and microwave are really a plus point because you can have your foods delivered and warm them up in the kitchen.

Rooftop area is beautiful and the infinity pool has such a pretty view. There is a laundry room in the hotel and it is a nice facility for those who stay long term. This hotel is a parking spot for Grab wheels and you can use it with Grab app for strolling around Berawa.

They have some house pets, the cat named Chibi who always hanging around in lobby and some dogs too!

I felt like home staying in Citadines Berawa. Definitely will come back if I stay in Canggu and will recommend this hotel to my friends!
title: Home away from home. Perfect for long stay

owner_response.text:

All the facilities you mentioned are also liked by our guests and not to mention the location. To update you for Chibi, our kind colleague is very loving and adopted Chibi, a happy story at the end. 

We thank you for the recommendation to TripAdvisor community and your friends. We hope to see you again 

With best regars,
Francisca Thorogood

owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text:
I really enjoyed my stay there!! Staffs were friendly and kind, I had a smooth check in. My room was located on the first floor so after a few days I figured that I could quickly access it via staircase instead of elevators (I like walking). My room was spacious, clean and bright. The AC was cold, bathroom spotless. No weird odor or bugs. Internet was fast--I had no trouble logging into work. Kitchen functioned well. Love that there was a laundry room that we could use freely, although there were mosquitoes near the room. 

Location is great: close to yoga studios (I went to Samadi and Pranava) and cafes, no difficulties when ordering Gojek. This hotel is also pet-friendly, so I was happy to be able to meet and pet other guests' dogs! Overall it's a great place for a long term stay.
title: Comfortable stay

owner_response.text:
Thank you for sharing your experience.

It is such a delight to know that you’ve found our rooms with the amenities, location and the staff as excellent. You pointed it right that our launderette is one of the highlight for our guests. Thank you and noted on your feedback of mosquitoes; we do our pest control weekly and it is unfortunate that this time of the year we experience more of insect especially our surrounding still has rice field and abandoned empty land. We will arrange to have mosquito's repellent or spray ready for our guests.

From your lovely experience with other guest's dogs perhaps we can welcome you back with your four-legged? We hope you have a safe journey back and share your wonderful stay with us to your family and friends.

Thank you and have a wonderful week ahead

With best regards,
Francisca
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text:
This pet friendly hotel is one of the reasons we wanted to stay a night in here with our lovely poodle, and this was our first time ever staying in a hotel with our dog. This is a brand new hotel right in the corner of Berawa in a quiet neighborhood so it's perfect if you want to escape from the bustling and noisy Seminyak or Kuta. It's very close to Berawa Beach, Finns Beach Club, the Tamora Gallery shopping arcade and several cafes and restaurants around Berawa.

We stayed in room 2140 in the middle building. The room is a studio type with a well equipped kitchen which has an electric stove, a microwave, sink, cooking appliances, cutleries as well as glass and chinaware so it's perfect for long term stay. The balcony is wide and we had a view towards the pool at the back (ignore the creepy unfinished building next door), very good for relaxing. Overall the room is quite spacious, very clean and nicely decorated. We and our dog had no issues sleeping at night so it's very comfortable.

Make sure to head over to the rooftop pool where the ocean view is great. We really loved it! There's also a rooftop pool where we ordered our free welcome drinks, and there was a live music playing in the evening. The sky lounge at the back is also enjoyable. Didn't try the "Lemon & Salt" restaurant since breakfast wasn't included in our stay, but it seems nice when I checked there a bit.

There's also a free laundry room (make sure to bring your own detergent) as well as fitness room on the ground floor. Since this is a pet friendly hotel, there will be a pet playground at the back building which is to be open by next year. Would love to check that out someday.

My only complaint here was after check-in. We had to wait nearly 45 minutes after we checked in at 12 in the afternoon to ensure that our room was ready. This was a bit annoying as it was hot at that time and we had a dog so I had to bring him out of the lobby to get some fresh air while waiting for our room. Unfortunately the staffs didn't informed us in advance so one of us decided to complain to the reception. We finally got in to our room shortly after that. At least the staff apologized.

Overall this is an excellent hotel, and highly recommended considering the location, amenities and the friendliness of the staff. Definitely will come back here again if the pet playground has open!
title: Staycation with our dog

owner_response.text:
Dear travelguyid_96,

It feels wonderful to receive such positive feedback from our guests and we thank you for taking the time to post your detail thoughts on Tripadvisor community.

We are also delighted to know you enjoyed your stay and thank you for advising potential guests reading this about 
our room, facilities and especially with a great location, it's certainly one of the highlights about being in the new 'destination' in Bali.  We are sorry to hear about the waiting time concern however were glad that it was resolved promptly. 

It is great to know that you will be back and we look forward to delight you again on your next visit. 

With best regards,
Francisca
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

Bridge leading from the pool to the sky lounge on the rooftop.
View from our balcony towards the pool in the back.

on and  off at cleanliness, amenities,  example:
* one time room, balcony well cleaned, next turn room, balcony not cleaned well.
* electric stove, glass wall near stove,(leftover cooking dung),  glass wall near washing dishes not cleaned well.
* soap and shampoo hasn't been refilled, ( 2x housekeeping in one week, i even remind it when i call for it )
* chlorine level in water (dry skin for sure)
title: New Building New Room

owner_response.text:
Dear Mardy27,

Thank you for sharing your experience to TripAdvisor community.

It is such a delight to know that you’ve found our rooms condition, facilities, and staff as excellent.

Your feedback for our Housekeeping team is valuable and it will be shared to our team for improvement. Apologize for the inconvenience and rest assure it will not be the recurrence in the future.

We look forward to welcoming you back with an improved service on your next visit.

With warm regards,
Francisca Thorogood
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text:
First time visiting Citadines Berawa, the hotel is only a stone throw away to Berawa Beach, the building is hard to miss. Upon arrival they gave us coupons to enjoy welcome drink at the rooftop bar, and wow I love it! A bar and rooftop swimming pool with almost 360 degrees view! They have a latin dance event when I went there, and I think it is a regular program from the hotel.

The room has a kitchenette which help us a lot when we want to cook or reheat our takeout food. It also provide a small refrigerator so our beers are always cold! AC is also cold, a necessity in hot and humid Bali. 

Going out to the balcony in the morning and sip a cup of hot tea is a plus (please ask for room with view to garden or the one not facing to neighbor)

I love the rain shower, the water pressure is good and importantly hot water is also stable. 

And a major advantage staying in this hotel is the laundrette, all guests can use it for free, you only need to bring your own detergent and softener. 

Kudos to all staff from the security to housekeeping that were always very helpful when we need extra assistance. 

Definitely will come back again!
title: Don't forget to go to the rooftop bar!

owner_response.text:
Hi Kartiniz,

Thank you very much for such a glowing review on a recent stay you had with us.  

It certainly sounds like we were able to create a seamless and pleasant journey for you.  I’m glad that you enjoyed the room and its facilities. Kitchenette and launderettes are one of our highlight and appreciate for advising potential guests about our beautiful rooftop. Your wonderful word for our staff will be surely shared and they will be happy to hear it.

 I hope that you had a safe and smooth journey home and that we will be able to welcome you back again soon.

With warm regards,
Francisca Thorogood

text: Our home for 1.5 months. Everything was so convenient. We love the apartment hotel concept where we have a kitchen in the room. A shared washer & dryer is also available within the facility. The location was perfect. Just a 3 minute walk from Berawa beach and it's also surrounded by all the famous Canggu cafes and restaurants. Their roof top pool and bar has a breathtaking view. It was the perfect spot to chill. We'd definitely come back.
title: Home away from home...

We hope that you had a safe and smooth journey home and that we will welcome you back again soon. 

Warm regards,
Francisca Thorogood

text:
During my Work From Bali, Citadines Berawa was the one of my favorite place to stay. Quiet, peaceful and cozy. Apartment concept is the most suitable for me to stay. 
Cozy kitchen with the high quality tools makes my day to be  more productive. Infinity pool on the rooftop is crazy stunning. Facing directly to the beach. It s suitable for long stay also. All the staff were also very kind and helpful.

We defenitely will be back one day.
title: Work From Bali

text: I stay in this greeny, beautiful yet modern hotel for 2 months for working from home. Staffs here are very friendly, the room is great and very clean, internet is good, the total building ambience is LOVELY. Rooftop pool view is super best! The food is also delicious ; more menu would be better though. It's a perfect place to stay and long stay. The beach is also so close 200 m by walking. Very recommended ; create a beautiful memmories :)...Definetely will go back here once stay in Berawa again.
title: Perfect stay in Berawa!

owner_response.text:
Dear obmk,

Thank you for staying with us and sharing your imperfect experience during your stay.

The rooftop bar has regular live music to complement the sunset time and to entertain our in-house guests and outside guests until 10pm. We completely understand and apologize that the music disturb you and family especially with small children. If you are still in the hotel please contact our team to find a solution despite we are full during this holidays period. 

Once again apologize for the situation 

With best regards,
Francisca Thorogood


From the feedback translation:
Night club or hotel ?? Unbearable music late at night!!
Is it a night club or a hotel?? The music in the evening is unbearable, too loud and not suitable for families, it is not normal that the music is so loud in the evening, I strongly advise against families this hotel if you are looking for tranquility, impossible to make children sleep before 22h !!
